conbody.p: With version 3.0.0.0, the beta version of Cloudera Navigator integration is no longer available with . Cloudera Navigator integration now requires a paid subscription. For more information about purchasing Cloudera Navigator integration, contact us.
When upgrading from a version with Cloudera Navigator integration enabled to version 3.0.0.0 without a paid subscription, perform the following post-upgrade task:

Do not include the Cloudera Navigator properties when you configure the 3.0.0.0 configuration file, sdc.properties. The properties to omit are:
lineage.publishers
lineage.publisher.navigator.def
All other properties with the lineage.publisher.navigator prefix
